```{python}
import pandas as pd

pd.set_option("display.max_rows", 5)

from siuba.data import penguins
from siuba import _, arrange
```

## Ascending order

```{python}
arrange(penguins, _.year, _.bill_length_mm)
```

## Descending order

```{python}
arrange(penguins, _.year, -_.bill_length_mm)
```

## Sorting by expression

```{python}
arrange(penguins, _.bill_length_mm / _.bill_depth_mm)
```
